# ChordsEngine\engine\3rdParty
cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.10.2)
project (glfw)
include_directories(${GLFW_INCLUDE})
include_directories(${GLFW_SRC})
link_directories(${GLFW_LIB})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin)
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/bin)
file(COPY "lib" DESTINATION ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR})
file(GLOB_RECURSE  SRC_DIR "./src/*.c" "./src/*.h" "./src/*.cpp" "./*c")
source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${SRC_DIR})
source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${GLFW_HEADER})
add_executable (glfw ${SRC_DIR} ${GLFW_HEADER})
target_link_libraries(glfw glfw3 opengl32)
